text: Alberto Jorge Fouilloux Ahumada (22 November 1940 – 23 June 2018) was a Chilean football midfielder and striker. He earned 70 caps and scored 12 goals for the Chile national team during his career. After retiring as a player Fouilloux went on to become a manager, serving as head coach of Huachipato and Colo-Colo. Fouilloux died on June 23, 2018 aged 77 in Santiago of lung cancer.Fallece el histórico ex futbolista Alberto "Tito" Fouillioux a los 77 años de edad ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Chilean footballers
title: Alberto Fouilloux
